sentences.sContent: Objective To observe the disinfection effect of gastroscope by ozone water.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To observe the disinfection effect of gastroscope by ozone water.
sentences.sCn: 目的观察臭氧水在胃镜体的消毒效果监测。

sentences.sContent: Their skin is weathered and tanned, as if they have fossilised themselves in ozone to keep death at bay.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their skin is weathered and tanned, as if they have fossilised themselves in ozone to keep death at bay.
sentences.sCn: 他们的皮肤饱经风霜被晒得黧黑，好像他们在臭氧中变成化石并在海湾边防止死亡。

sentences.sContent: The synergistic effect of oxygen and (or ) ozone in atmosphere with ultraviolet also led to the adhesion failure of adhesive.
sentences.sContent_eng: The synergistic effect of oxygen and (or ) ozone in atmosphere with ultraviolet also led to the adhesion failure of adhesive.
sentences.sCn: 大气中的氧和（或）臭氧与紫外线协同作用是导致该压敏粘合剂失粘的原因。

remMethod.val: o(看作oxygen， 氧气) ＋ zone(地带) → 臭氧

trans.tranOther: a poisonous blue gas that is a type of oxygen
